name: qrcode-npm
readme: qrcode-npm ========== This is an npm module for qrcode JavaScript library (http://www.d-project.com/qrcode) Notice that I am not the author of the code, I am just simply creating an npm module out of the great library from Kazuhiko Arase Notice also that there is another module (node-qrcode, see: https://github.com/soldair/node-qrcode), which is more sophisticated and uses canvas object: * qrcode-npm uses img or table tags, which is more friendly to older browsers * if you know your target browser is canvas capable then I recommend using node-qrcode module examples -------- var qrCode = require('qrcode') var qr = qrCode.qrcode(4, 'M'); qr.addData(text); qr.make(); qr.createImgTag(4); // creates an tag as text qr.createTableTag(4); // creates a tag as text install ------- npm install qrcode-npm The word "QR Code" is registered trademark of DENSO WAVE INCORPORATED
